name: 917 Series 2 Wireless Headphones
desc: Whether it’s integral to your setup or mere preference, these wireless earphones available in the Philippines excel when wired, too. Paired with memory foam and soft synthetic leather on each earpad, they’re your next step to maximum comfort and convenience.
feature:
- Rich and Powerful Bass Sound
- Bluetooth Version 5.0
- Long Battery Life
- Ergonomic and Portable Design
- Intuitive Built-in Button Controls
specification:
Bluetooth Version: V5.0
Profile Support: HFP/A2DP/AVCTP/AVDTP/AVRCP
Stand-by Time: 100 h
Talk Time: 13 h-15 h
Music Play Time: 12 h
Charging Time: 2 h
Charging Voltage: DC 5V
Frequency Range: 2.402G-2.480G
Ambient Temperature: -20/+60C°
Transmission Distance: 10m
Battery Capacity: 250mAh

name: 917 Series Refresh Wireless Earphones
desc: The 0917 Wireless Earphones are lightweight, flexible, and ergonomic that offer stereo sound for up to 10 hours. These wireless earphones are just for you if you’ve got an active, on-the-go type of lifestyle.
feature:

- Intuitive Controls
- Built-in MIcrophone
- Flexible Neckband
specification:

Drive: 10mm
Sensitivity: 90db±3db

name: 917 Series Refresh Wall Charger Black
desc: This compact 0917 phone charger can deliver up to 20W of fast charging and recharge your smartphone up to 60% in half an hour. Its dual ports also support multiple fast charging protocols, so you can recharge devices simultaneously at full speed.
feature:
- Versatile Power Solution
- 3X Faster Charging
- Simultaneous Fast Charging
- Multiple Circuit Protection
specification:
Power Input: 100-240V ~ 50/60Hz
Power Output:
Type-C: DC5V3A/9V2A/12V1.5A/15V1.67A (PD3.0&QC2.0&3.0,SCP,AFC,MAX20W)
USB-A: DC5V3A/9V2A/12V1.5A (MAX18W) QC2.0&3.0, FCP, AFC, SCP
Material: ABS + PC Plastic; Fire retardant V-0
Size: L48*D46.8*H27 (mm)
